lead_paragraph: Ohio's top court has ruled that sentences for suspects caught with cocaine can be based on the weight of the entire amount, which could include filler material such as baking soda.
snippet: Ohio's top court has ruled that sentences for suspects caught with cocaine can be based on the weight of the entire amount, which could include filler material such as baking soda....

headline.main: U.N. Nuclear Chief Says Confident of U.S. Cooperation on Iran Deal
